title: Defender
lyrics:
I will protect you
Stand in the way
I'm a defender
Come what may
Do as you please to
I see that you do

Only take notice when

I'm in front of you



I will protect you

Stand in the way

I'm a defender

Come what may

Do as you please to

I see that you do

Only take notice when

I'm in front of you



I will protect you

Stand in the way

I'm a defender

Come what may

Do as you please to

I see that you do

Only take notice when

I'm in front of you



I will protect you

Stand in the way

I'm a defender

Come what may

Do as you please to

I see that you do

Only take notice when

I'm in front of you



I will protect you

Stand in the way

I'm a defender

Come what may

Do as you please to

I see that you do

Only take notice when

I'm in front of you



Don't stand so close to the edge (I will protect you)

You know I'm a warrior (Stand in the way)

Images fly through my head (I'm a defender)

What's this scenario? (Come what may)

Let me stand near you, attend (Do as you please to)

I'll be your barrier (I see that you do)

See that you [?] (Only take notice when)

But you know I'm a warrior
